post.text: For a start - Crooked Hillary should return the $10M-$25M back to Saudi Arabia, IMMEDIATELY!

comment.author: Joshua
comment.text: The old adage is:. When one lies with dogs they come back with fleas.....the fleas are Radical Islam Terrorists!!! Hillary own it witch!!!! Say it!!!!! This is a prime example of a treasonous ACT!!!

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Taking money from them!!! Our enemies!!!
